data.why:
A language-flexible syntax highlighting module designed for the
    web. The only one I found was Syntax::Highlight::Perl which,
    obviously, only supports Perl (as well as more than just the web).
    I've written (and am continuing to finish) a parser for common
    plaintext grammars that are amply available to allow markup of any
    language. Output is just customizable text, but generally aimed at
    html.
